EXPERIENCE THE CULTURE

Through history we see examples of great leaders and world changers who are inspired by the culture they are surrounded by. Similarly, we want our volunteers to be part of an experience that will expand their horizons while reaching out to others. There is beauty when two or more cultures have a planned encounter.

GIVING AND LEARNING

On each trip we offer our volunteers the opportunity to understand and learn new ways to rely on God and engage with people. In a practical way, our volunteers are able to give of themselves by getting involved in each activity. We believe our volunteers acquire valuable lessons that will integrate into their everyday lives.

create new friendships

They welcomed us in like old friends"â€” Yes, we work with our local team to provide a safe and friendly environment. Each local family truly care and love on each volunteer. Relationships made in a week have impacted the lives of our volunteers. Our volunteers learn how important people are and through these people and our amazing teams we have learned how to love people well.
